arn.description: ARN of the Glue Data Quality Ruleset.

createdOn.description: The time and date that this data quality ruleset was created.

description.description: Description of the data quality ruleset.

lastModifiedOn.description: The time and date that this data quality ruleset was created.

name.description: Name of the data quality ruleset.

recommendationRunId.description: When a ruleset was created from a recommendation run, this run ID is generated to link the two together.

ruleset.description: A Data Quality Definition Language (DQDL) ruleset. For more information, see the AWS Glue developer guide.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

targetTable.description: A Configuration block specifying a target table associated with the data quality ruleset. See `target_table` below.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering DataQualityRuleset resources.
